original_text: And I brought him to your disciples, and they could not heal him.”
korean_text: 내가 주의 제자들에게 데리고 왔으나 능히 고치지 못하더이다

sentences.original_text: And I brought him to your disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그를 당신의 제자들에게 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and they could not heal him
